quote: I do have parameters and I do have standards. And I think this is what's important is like I do set out the year thinking how do I want to grow.
why_clipworthy: It challenges the traditional goal-setting approach and emphasizes personal growth.
suggested_hook: Why traditional goal-setting might be holding you back.

quote: Share your why. Why do you do this? Because people want to know.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the power of personal storytelling in building client relationships.
suggested_hook: The secret to connecting with your clients on a deeper level.
